thread.title: Man United boss Jose Mourinho to make new approach for Chelsea star: Blues will want £40m
thread.title_full: Man United boss Jose Mourinho to make new approach for Chelsea star: Blues will want £40m

title: Man United boss Jose Mourinho to make new approach for Chelsea star: Blues will want £40m
text: Man United boss Jose Mourinho to make new approach for Chelsea star: Blues will want £40m MANCHESTER UNITED will reportedly go back in to try and sign Willian from Chelsea this summer. PUBLISHED: 22:55, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 | UPDATED: 23:23, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 The Brazil winger revealed this week Jose Mourinho recently made an offer to take him to Old Trafford , but he remained at Stamford Bridge. Willian was Chelsea's star performer under Mourinho last season before the Portuguese coach was sacked. And according to the Daily Star , United will test the water over a move in the next transfer window. GETTY Jose Mourinho tried to sign Willian at Manchester United in the summer but he stayed at Chelsea Willian's been limited to making an impact from the bench, which he also admitted is far from ideal A positive for the Red Devils is Willian has struggled to nail down a starting role this term. Antonio Conte has opted for in-form Pedro and Eden Hazard as his wide attackers in recent months. As a result, Willian's been limited to making an impact from the bench, which he also admitted is far from ideal. Antonio Conte v Jose Mourinho: Chelsea managers' stats compared Fri, December 16, 2016
